column5: Enjoy privacy and comfort in a lovely bedroom with its own spacious bath. The space comfortably fits two and is centrally located in a charming residential neighborhood close to restaurants and coffee shops. Plus, there's a great bike for your exclusive use, complete with lock and helmet. Your perfect home-away-from-home for SXSW, ACL, UT, and more!
column8: Walk to UT, downtown! Cozy bed/bath
